title: The Clever Weaver and the Greedy King

chapters.title: The Weaver's Dilemma
chapters.description: A poor weaver struggles to make ends meet but gains an audience with a greedy king.

chapters.title: The Promise of Magic
chapters.description: The weaver promises the king a magical turban that reveals one’s virtues and flaws.

chapters.title: The King's Impatience
chapters.description: The king grows eager and impatient, revealing his material greed and vanity.

chapters.title: The Weaver's Revelation
chapters.description: The weaver cleverly exposes the king’s flaws through his wit and clever explanation.

chapters.title: The Lesson Learned
chapters.description: The king realizes his greed and rewards the weaver for his wisdom instead.
